title: Katica Roy on Keys to Closing the Gender Pay Gap
itunes:title: Katica Roy on Keys to Closing the Gender Pay Gap
description:
Katica Roy, CEO at Pipeline, discusses gender equality and pay equity ahead of International Women’s Day.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
